segments.text: I feel a sense of disgust watching this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is just so messy and wasteful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes, while everything else is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children sneaking cookies, and it's clear they have no respect for the rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is just asking for trouble, and it's disgusting to see him risking his safety for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting for her cookie seems so entitled, like she expects to get what she wants without consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman is so focused on that plate when there's so much else going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so gross and irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone does something soon before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
